import { useContext } from "react"; import UserBgImg from "../../components/userBgImg"; import UserImg from "../../components/userImg"; import { AuthContext } from "../../contexts/authContext"; const Profile = ({ user, isFollowed, handleFollow, onOpenModal }) => { const { currentUser } = useContext(AuthContext); return (
{user.id === currentUser.id ? : isFollowed ? : }

{user.name + " "}

{'@' + user.username}

{user.bio}

) } export default Profile;
